sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import Input from '../atoms/Input' import * as yup from "yup" import {yupResolver} from "@hookform/resolvers/yup" import api from '../api/axiosConfig' import {AlertBox} from '../alerts/AlertBox' import { UserDataTypes } from '../types/pmsTypes' import { useUserData } from '../Providers/UserDataProvider' type AddEmployeeFormTypes = { firstName: string, lastName: string, email: string, dateOfBirth: Date, gender: string, contactInformation: string, role: string, basicSalary: number, joinDate: Date, designation: string, password: string } type EmployeeFormPropsTypes = { formType?: "EDIT" row?:any } const schema = yup.object().shape({ firstName: yup.string().required("First name is required"), lastName: yup.string().required("Last name is required"), email:yup.string().email("Invalid email format").required("Email is required"), dateOfBirth: yup.date().typeError("Must have date of birth").required("Birth date is required"), gender: yup.string().required('Gender is required'), contactInformation: yup.string().required("Must have a phone number"), role: yup.string().required("Must have a role"), basicSalary: yup.number().required("Salary is required"), joinDate: yup.date().typeError("Join date is required").required("Must have a join date"), designation:yup.string().required("Must have a designation"), password: yup.string().required("Passoword is required") }) export const EmployeeForm = ({formType,row}:EmployeeFormPropsTypes) => { const [error,setError] = useState(false) const [success,setSuccess] = useState(false) const [message,setMessage] =useState('') const {userData,setUserData} = useUserData() const {register,formState,handleSubmit} = useForm( { defaultValues:formType?convertToAddEmpForm(row):undefined, resolver: yupResolver(schema) } ) const {errors} = formState const onSubmit = async (data:AddEmployeeFormTypes) => { const headers = { Authorization:`Bearer ${localStorage.getItem("X-AUTH")}` } if(!formType){ await api.post("/employee",data,{headers}) .then(() => { setSuccess(true) setError(false) setMessage("Added successfully") }) .catch(error => { setError(true) setSuccess(false) setMessage(error.response.data.errorMessage) }) } else{ const updateDate = {...data,id:row.id} await api.put("/employee",updateDate,{headers}) .then((response) => { setSuccess(true) setError(false) setMessage("Updated successfully") return response }) .then((response) => { if(response.data.id === userData.id) setUserData(response.data) }) .catch(error => { setError(true) setSuccess(false) setMessage(error.response.data.errorMessage) }) } } return ( <>
{errors.gender &&

{errors.gender.message}

}
{errors.role?.message}
{errors.designation?.message}
) } function convertToAddEmpForm(data: UserDataTypes): AddEmployeeFormTypes { const addEmpFormData: AddEmployeeFormTypes = { firstName: data.firstName || '', lastName: data.lastName || '', email: data.email || '', dateOfBirth: new Date(data.dateOfBirth) || new Date().getDate(), gender: data.gender || '', contactInformation: data.contactInformation || '', role: data.role || '', basicSalary: Number(data.basicSalary) || 0, joinDate: new Date(data.joinDate) || new Date(), designation: data.designation || '', password: '', }; return addEmpFormData; }
